dcterms:description: A platform to study the sample efficiency of grounded language learning, featuring various environments where agents must reach goal locations while interacting with objects like doors and keys.
dcterms:title: BabyAI

dcterms:description: An environment in the BabyAI suite where the agent must pick up a key to unlock a door and then reach the goal location.
dcterms:title: BabyAI DoorKey

dcterms:description: An environment in the BabyAI suite where the agent must reach the goal location in a completely empty room with randomized starting positions.
